info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 5:21PM EST until December 22 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 13.3 feet and slowly receding. - Forecast...The river will fall to 13.1 feet this evening. It will then rise to 13.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will fall to 13.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then rise to 13.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Tue 4 pm: 13.3 Forecast: Tue 7 pm 13.1 Wed 1 am 13.2 Wed 7 am 13.1 Wed 1 pm 13.2 Wed 7 pm 13.0 Thu 1 am 12.8 Thu 7 am 12.3 Thu 1 pm 11.8 Thu 7 pm 11.5 Fri 1 am 11.1 Fri 7 am 10.8 Fri 1 pm 10.4 &&
